message.name: SET_LEDS
message.description: This message permits control of LED animations on the ARDrone.

message.name: SET_PCMD
message.description: Send progressive commands - makes the drone move (translate/rotate)

message.name: HOVER
message.description: This will make the drone hold its position. Alternatively, if a SET_PCMD was previously sent affecting angular speed (yaw), you can make the drone hover while turning
message.field: 1: Stop the drone before hovering, 0: keep angular motion before hovering
